Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at 54th/Cermak
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 71st/Stony Island.
ShortDescription: NB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/Stony Island.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
